summary.span: 表示一個面板，支援水平捲動 中的標籤。

span.span: Represents a panel that supports horizontal scrolling of tabs in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供水平捲動的行控制項。The provides horizontal scrolling by line for controls in a . 不支援向上或向下捲動並逐頁捲動。Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
